#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define INF 20000000
#define MAX 1004
using namespace std;
typedef pair< int, int > pii;
vector< pii > G[MAX];
int d[MAX];
void dij(int start){
    int u, v, c, w;
    priority_queue< pii, vector< pii >, greater< pii > > Q;
    for(int i=0;i<MAX;i++)
            d[i] = INF;
    Q.push(pii(0,start));
    d[start] = 0;
    while(!Q.empty()){
        u = Q.top().second;
        c = Q.top().first;
        Q.pop();
        if(d[u]<c) continue;
        for(int i=0;i<G[u].size();i++){
            v = G[u][i].first;
            w = G[u][i].second;
            if(d[v]>d[u]+w){
                d[v] = d[u]+w;
                Q.push(pii(d[v],v));
            }
        }
    }
}
int main() {
    std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int n,a,b;
    vector < pii > v;
    cin>>n;
    v.push_back(pii(0,0));
    for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){
        cin>>a>>b;
        v.push_back(pii(a,b));
    }
    //cout<<v.size()<<endl;
    for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++){
        for(int j=i+1;j<v.size();j++){
            int dis = pow((v[i].first-v[j].first),2)+pow((v[i].second-v[j].second),2);
            G[i+1].push_back(pii(j+1,dis));
            G[j+1].push_back(pii(i+1,dis));
        }
    }
    dij(1);
    //for(int i=1;i<=n+2;i++){
      //  for(int j=0;j<G[i].size();j++)
        //    cout<<G[i][j].first<<" "<<G[i][j].second<<endl;
        //cout<<endl;
    //}
    cout<<d[n+2];
    return 0;
}
